text:
Created attachment 22369
Description: Contains JUnit test class and documents used for testing.

The text contained in the comments of a power point 2007 document is not extracted.
Find in attachments the JUnit test class and the document used for testing.
We expected to extract the word "testdoc".

Notes on the attached documents:

- the documents "TextInComment_1.pptx" contains the word "testdoc" as comment.


"TestUnitPoi35Filter.java" is the JUnit class.
creator: grizolle_benedicte@emc.com
